1110010010110010 0111110101011110 1 -> sum: 0110001000010001, cout: 1

0010101100101100 1101110101010100 1 -> sum: 0000100010000001, cout: 1

1000001000101111 1001111001111001 0 -> sum: 0010000010101000, cout: 1
